text:
In the graphics that appeared in these columns alongside the report ‘Multi-cornered contest could make it difficult for DMK’ on March 12, the number of seats contested by the AIADMK in 2006 and 2011 Assembly polls must read as 182 and 160 respectively and for the DMK the relevant figures are 130 and 119 and not as published. Similarly, the number of seats contested by the allies of these parties in the two elections are 52 and 74 for the AIADMK front and 104 and 115 for the DMK front.

The error is regretted.
title: Correction
